attributes.action: Student Finance to Recognise JNC exemption from ELQ (Equivilent Level Qualifications)
attributes.additional_details:
Student Finance to Recognise JNC exemption from ELQ (Equivilent Level Qualifications)

This petition has been started due to student finance stating that further training for youth and community work course at Level 6 is not fundable and in result has had student drop from the course.
